content:
I am going to collect here some information about organizations that was shared in the discussion, with the hope that at some point we'll have a better way to collect these:

  • Article about the Mathematical and Theoretical Biology Institute: 1551-0018_2013_5_6_1351.pdf
  • NAM: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Association_of_Mathematicians, with Edray Goins as president, and focuses on Black mathematicians.
  • Mathematical Gifted and Black network: https://mathematicallygiftedandblack.com/

Report from the American Institute of Physics: THE TIME IS NOW Systemic Changes to Increase African Americans with Bachelorâ€™s Degrees in Physics and Astronomy https://www.aip.org/sites/default/files/aipcorp/files/teamup-full-report.pdf
